genericMessages.errorBotPermissionU: Manager is missing some permissions to do that.
genericMessages.errorBotPermissionS: Manager is missing the `{$1}` permissions to do that.
genericMessages.errorNoEmbedsForLog: Manager cannot display this logging item because it's missing the 'Embed Links' Permission node.
genericMessages.errorNoConfig: Cannot load the config for this file, Please try again in a couple seconds.
genericMessages.errorNotNSFW: This can only be done in a NSFW channel.
genericMessages.errorBotUnavailable: Manager is temporarily not available. Try again in a couple minutes!

rooms.noPermission: You cannot summon a private room.
rooms.noRoom: You don't seem to have a room.
rooms.noRoomsAvailable: There are too many rooms active at the moment.
rooms.roomPasscode: The passcode for your room is `{1}`
rooms.inviteNone: You need to specifiy at least 1 person to invite.
rooms.inviteTooMany: You can only invite up to {$1} people at a time.
rooms.kickNone: You need to specify at least 1 person to kick.
rooms.kickTooMany: You can only kick up to {$1} people at a time.
rooms.banNone: You need to specify at least 1 person to ban.
rooms.banTooMany: You can only ban up to {$1} people at a time.
rooms.optionMemberlimit: Changed your Voice Channel's `Max Members` to `{$1}`
rooms.optionEmbed: Changed your Text Channel's `Embed Permission` to `{$1}`
rooms.optionNSFW: Changed your Text Channel's `NSFW Warning` to `{$1}`
rooms.optionReactions: Changed your Text Channel's `Reaction Permission` to `{$1}`
